attributes.description:
Balance of BMW Motorplan. 
Motoplan up to 27 June 2027/ 100 000Km. 

Features:
Phytonic Blue Metallic,
Leather 'Vernasca' Black with decorative stitching,
Double-spoke style 787 M, mixed tyres, 20" wheels,
Brake System, Country-specific Equipment,
Runflat tyres,
Gearshift paddles for Automatic transmission,
Tyre Pressure Monitoring,
Comfort Access,
Deletion of BMW Digital Key,
M Sport package,
Trailer tow hitch, fully electrically operated,
BMW Individual roof rails high-gloss Shadow Line,
Panorama glass sliding/tilting sunroof,
electrically operated,
Roller Sun Blind For Rear Side Windows (mechanical),
Deletion front passenger lumbar support and backrest width adjustment,
Seat width adjustment,
Int.trim fin. Aluminium Rhombicle dark with highlight trim fin, Pearl Chrome,
Parking Assist,
HI-FI loudspeaker system,
Connected Package Professional,
Convenience telephony with extended smartphone connectivity,
BMW Live Cockpit Professional,
Deletion of touch function for BMW IDrive controller,
M Sports Suspension,
Steering wheel M Leather,
M Aerodynamic kit,
BMW Individual high-gloss Shadow Line,
Anthracite roof lining,
BMW Individual high-gloss Shadow Line with extended contents,
Telematics and Online Service provider control,
Deluxe Package,
EU5 exhaust emissions standard,
Larger-capacity fuel tank,
ACEA/CO2 content,
Locking wheel bolts,
Performance Control,
Variable sport steering,
Alarm system with radio remote control,
Spray jets without heating,
Luggage compartment net,
Velour floor mats,
Warning triangle and first aid kit,
Interior and Exterior mirror with automatic anti-dazzle function,
Automatic anti-dazzle interior mirror,
Manually adjustable rear seat backrest,
Sport seats for driver and front passenger,
Storage compartment package,
Galvanic embellisher for controls,
Ambient interior lighting,
Automatic air conditioning with microfilter,
Speedometer with kilometer reading,
Adaptive LED headlights,
High Beam Assist,
Front passenger airbag deactivation,
Area code 2 for DVD,
Intelligent emergency calling,
TeleServices,
ConnectedDrive Services,
Hot climate countries version,
Language version English,
Owner's Handbook/service Booklet, English,
Oil-service interval 20,000 km/18 months,
Automatic lock when driving away,
VIN visible from the exterior,
Double locking function,

Motoplan up to 27 June 2027/100 000Km.

The BMW X3 stands out confidently from the crowd with its striking design: With the high-quality accessories from BMW M Performance Parts, you can emphasize the sporty character of this distinctive SAV.

Nationwide delivery.
T&C's apply.
